products.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dramatic dark teal blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to any room. Use the rimini blue to match pretty florals in the bedroom for a fresh, country look, or stark whites in the kitchen for a contemporary style. It's also the perfect shade for a sea-themed bathroom or a fun, colourful playroom for the kids.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout material that provides all you need when it comes to keeping out the glare of the sun. Combine the pretty bluebell colour with soft yellows and rich creams to create a vibrant yet not overpowering colour scheme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cobalt - Roller Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure to add a burst of alluring colour and personality wherever it goes. Display the cobalt against a contrasting white and dove grey background for a contemporary palette in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your room or affecting your night's sleep. Offset the navy against a bright reds and ice whites for a fun, naval theme in a living room or bedroom. Or consider combining it with a lighter blues and purples for a beautifully stepped colour theme in a dining room or home office.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Navy Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy. The variation in width of the stripes gives this high quality blackout blind a fresh and modern look. Stripy blue works perfectly when you are looking to add to, or create, a blue-themed kitchen or living room, to show of the true range of tones. Alternatively, why not fit the stripy blue in the hallway or landing, to give an often overlooked area of the home a more upbeat look? Stripy (blackout), blue - roller blind stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy.

products.title: Rubber Duck (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new rubber duck blackout navy fabric is the finishing touch your new bathroom has been waiting for. With a playful design that's guaranteed to make you smile, combined in perfect harmony with a healthy dose of contemporary chic style, it has everything you could ever want from your new roller blinds. Match rubber duck with a range of light blue painted walls, and a whole host of trinkets on the walls.
